terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.inputs
Interface InputPauseTarget

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionTrigger, InputPauseSplitter
public interface InputPauseTarget

This interface serves as a target for user interface mouse-over pause input events.

Method Summary
 void setInputPause(boolean pause)
          Called when a mouse-over pause begins or ends.
 

Method Detail

setInputPause

public void setInputPause(boolean pause)
Called when a mouse-over pause begins or ends.

Parameters:
pause - True when pause begins. False when it ends.
